NotSoDefect:Dualcast.NAME: Dualcast
NotSoDefect:Dualcast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Evoke your next Orb twice.

NotSoDefect:GoForTheEyes.NAME: Go for the Eyes
NotSoDefect:GoForTheEyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.
NotSoDefect:GoForTheEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak and draw a card.

NotSoDefect:DoubleEnergy.NAME: Double Energy
NotSoDefect:DoubleEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Double your Energy. NL Exhaust.

NotSoDefect:Redo.NAME: Recursion
NotSoDefect:Redo.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Channel the Orb that was just Evoked. NL Draw a card.

NotSoDefect:BootSequence.NAME: Boot Sequence
NotSoDefect:BootSequence.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
NotSoDefect:BootSequence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

NotSoDefect:Recycle.NAME: Recycle
NotSoDefect:Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [B] equal to its cost.
NotSoDefect:Recycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [B] equal to its cost.

NotSoDefect:Fusion.NAME: Fusion
NotSoDefect:Fusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Plasma. NL Draw a card.

NotSoDefect:GeneticAlgorithm.NAME: Genetic Algorithm
NotSoDefect:GeneticAlgorithm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Permanently increase this card's Block by !M!. NL Exhaust.
NotSoDefect:GeneticAlgorithm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. Permanently increase this card's Block by !M!. NL Exhaust.

NotSoDefect:Amplify.NAME: Amplify
NotSoDefect:Amplify.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL This turn, your next Power card is played twice.

NotSoDefect:StaticDischarge.NAME: Static Discharge
NotSoDefect:StaticDischarge.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, trigger all Lightning's passive ability; If the damage is unblocked, Channel !M! Lightning .

NotSoDefect:EchoForm.NAME: Echo Form
NotSoDefect:EchoForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first card you play each turn is played twice.
NotSoDefect:EchoForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The first card you play each turn is played twice.

NotSoDefect:CoreSurge.NAME: Core Surge
NotSoDefect:CoreSurge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Clear debuffs. NL Exhaust.

NotSoDefect:Reprogram.NAME: Reprogram
NotSoDefect:Reprogram.DESCRIPTION: Transform Focus to equal positive Strength and Dexterity , NL or gain !M! Focus . NL Exhaust.
NotSoDefect:Reprogram.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform Focus to equal positive Strength and Dexterity , NL or gain !M! Focus . NL Retain.

NotSoDefect:Melter.NAME: Melter
NotSoDefect:Melter.DESCRIPTION: Enemy lose Artifact and can not gain Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust .
NotSoDefect:Melter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy can not gain Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust .

NotSoDefect:HelloWorld.NAME: Hello World
NotSoDefect:HelloWorld.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a upgraded Common card with Ethereal into your hand.
NotSoDefect:HelloWorld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate . NL At the start of your turn, add a upgraded Common card with Ethereal into your hand.

NotSoDefect:Scrape.NAME: Scrape
NotSoDefect:Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard non-Attack cards drawn that do not cost 0, and make them cost 0 until played.
NotSoDefect:Scrape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard non-Attack cards drawn that do not cost 0, and make them cost 0 until played.

NotSoDefect:ForceField.NAME: ForceField
NotSoDefect:ForceField.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Blur. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 less for each Power card played this combat.
NotSoDefect:ForceField.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Blur. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 less for each Power card played this combat.

NotSoDefect:RipAndTear.NAME: Rip and Tear
NotSoDefect:RipAndTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for !M! times. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

NotSoDefect:LockOn.NAME: Lock On
NotSoDefect:LockOn.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Deal !D! damage。 NL Apply !M! Lock-On .
NotSoDefect:LockOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Deal !D! damage。 NL Apply !M! Lock-On .

NotSoDefect:AutoShields.NAME: Auto Shields
NotSoDefect:AutoShields.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . NL  When drawn, gain 11 Block.
NotSoDefect:AutoShields.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . NL  When drawn, gain 11 Block. NL Draw a card.

NotSoDefect:MachineLearning.NAME: Machine Learning
NotSoDefect:MachineLearning.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw an extra card, and randomly upgrade !M! cards in your hand during this combat.
NotSoDefect:MachineLearning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw an extra card, and randomly upgrade !M! cards in your hand during this combat.

NotSoDefect:SelfRepair.NAME: Self Repair
NotSoDefect:SelfRepair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen . NL At the start of your turn, randomly exhaust 1 Status or Curse, and at the start, draw a card for each exhausted one.
NotSoDefect:SelfRepair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen . NL At the start of your turn, randomly exhaust 1 Status or Curse, and at the start, draw a card for each exhausted one.

NotSoDefect:FTL.NAME: FTL
NotSoDefect:FTL.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, and make them cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust .
NotSoDefect:FTL.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, and make them cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust .

NotSoDefect:Storm.NAME: Storm
NotSoDefect:Storm.DESCRIPTION: When a Lightning Orb is #yEvoked, draw a card and gain !M! Block.
NotSoDefect:Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When a Lightning Orb is #yEvoked, draw a card and gain !M! Block.

NotSoDefect:CreativeAI.NAME: Creative AI
NotSoDefect:CreativeAI.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you can Exhaust !M! cards, and gain a Power card that costs 1 less for each card Exhausted.
NotSoDefect:CreativeAI.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you can Exhaust !M! cards, and gain a Power card that costs 1 less for each card Exhausted.

NotSoDefect:MultiCast.NAME: Multi-Cast
NotSoDefect:MultiCast.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb X times. NL Gain X-2 [B] .
NotSoDefect:MultiCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb X times. NL Gain X-1 [B] .

NotSoDefect:Rainbow.NAME: Rainbow
NotSoDefect:Rainbow.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Exhaust .
NotSoDefect:Rainbow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 Dark .

NotSoDefect:Reboot.NAME: Reboot
NotSoDefect:Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status cards. NL Shuffle and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust .
NotSoDefect:Reboot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status cards. NL Shuffle and draw !M! cards. NL Clear debuffs. NL Exhaust .

NotSoDefect:ThunderStrike.NAME: Thunder Strike
NotSoDefect:ThunderStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL Trigger all Lightning 's passive ability once for each damage.
NotSoDefect:ThunderStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL Trigger all Lightning 's passive ability once for each damage.
